group.label: Genetal Settings
group.comment:
Magento Chatbot v0.0.16

To use this module you'll have to use SSL in your store.

field.label: Enable Module
field.comment: Enable module.

field.label: Your Secret Key
field.comment: This is your custom secret key used for the webhook url, to activate/deactivate the api webhook for telegram, and to use as your challenge hub for facebook. alphanumeric only! access http://(your_store_url)/chatbot/chatdata/(api)/webhook/(your_custom_key) to set the webhook, change api to "telegram" or "facebook".

field.label: List Empty Categories
field.comment: Enable listing of categories with no products or unallowed products (this module supports only simple products for now).

field.label: Enable Promotional Messages
field.comment: Enable the option for the customer to choose to receive or not promotional messages.

field.label: Enable Log
field.comment: Log will be at root/var/log/.

group.label: Messenger Settings
group.comment:
Magento Chatbot v0.0.16

To use this module you'll have to use SSL in your store.

field.label: Enable Messenger Bot
field.comment: Enable Messenger bot.

field.label: Unavailability Message
field.comment: Message to send when bot is disabled. leave it empty to send no message. please check the maximum size for messages on telegram api, otherwise your message might not be sent.

field.label: Page Access Token
field.comment: Your page access token.

field.label: Facebook Page Username
field.comment: Facebook page username.

field.label: Enable Facebook Messenger Box
field.comment: Enable Facebook Messenger box

field.label: Facebook Messenger Box Size
field.comment: Facebook messenger box size.

field.label: Enable Referral
field.comment: Enable referral.

field.label: Referral Message
field.comment: Referral message.

field.label: Messenger Support Chat ID
field.comment: The chat ID of the support admin. This feature isn't very useful since you can simply log into your page and directly reply your customers from there.

field.label: Welcome Message
field.comment: First message the bot will send to your client. please check the maximum size for messages on facebook api, otherwise your message might not be sent. you can use "{customername}" to send the customer name.

field.label: Enable Welcome Message Options
field.comment: Enable welcome message options.

field.label: Welcome Message Options
field.comment: Welcome message options.

field.label: Help Message
field.comment: Message will be sent when customer asks for help. please check the maximum size for messages on facebook api, otherwise your message might not be sent.

field.label: Enable Command Listing on Help Command
field.comment: Enable command listing when customer ask for help.

field.label: Commands List
field.comment: Code of the commands and it's alias. Alias must be split by comma. eg.: "support,chat,talk,sac".

field.label: Enable Default Replies
field.comment: Enable default replies.

field.label: Default Replies
field.comment: Replies to be send to the customer whenever matches one of the requirements.

field.label: Fallback Message
field.comment: Message will be sent when the bot don't understand customer messages for the Nst time.

field.label: Fallback Quantity
field.comment: Number of fallbacks before sending the fallback message.
